org.dayatang.domain

Class AbstractEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dayatang.domain.BaseEntity
      • org.dayatang.domain.AbstractEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSubjectEntity, Accountability, Dictionary, DictionaryCategory, EmployeeArchieve, Observer, Party, Person

    @MappedSuperclass
public abstract class AbstractEntity
extends BaseEntity
    一种抽象实体类，提供ID和版本属性，以及基本的持久化方法
    Author:
    yang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static <T extends Entity> List<T> findByProperties(Class<T> clazz,
